import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "../styles/Home.css"; import walletImage from "../images/wallet.png"; // Importa la imagen import folderIcon from "../images/folder.svg"; import fileIcon from "../images/file.svg"; import managementIcon from "../images/management.svg"; function Home() { return (
{/* Sección principal con la imagen Wallet */}

Stock by Choice: your best choice for Portfolio Management

{/* Sección destacada con tarjetas */}

Understand the value of your investments

{/* Feature 1 */}

Portfolio Insights

Evaluate your portfolio at a glance with clear analytics on risk, allocation, and sector breakdowns.

{/* Feature 2 */}

Stock Intersection

Instantly identify overlapping assets and see how securities impact your overall performance.

{/* Feature 3 */}

Trusted Ratings

Monitor progress and evaluate your investments with trusted ratings and comprehensive data.

); } export default Home;
